scripts.sass-watch-scss: echo Wacthing SASS... && sass --watch src/scss/:public/css/ --style compressed --no-source-map
scripts.sass-build-scss: echo [1/3] Building SASS... && sass src/scss/:public/css/ --style compressed --no-source-map
scripts.css-auto-prefix: echo [3/3] Adding CSS prefixes... && npx postcss public/css/*.css --use autoprefixer -d public/css
scripts.webpack-watch-js: echo Webpack is watching JS... && webpack --watch
scripts.webpack-build-js: echo [2/3] Webpack is building JS... && webpack
scripts.dev: npm run sass-build-scss && npm-run-all --parallel sass-watch-scss webpack-watch-js
